column5: Comfortable one bedroom guest house with exposed country living close to city feeling! 20 minutes from Downtown Fort Worth, TX. Full Kitchen, enjoy a country living within the city. Conveniently located 20 minutes to Joe Pool Lake, and 30-45 minutes to Dallas downtown, 25 minutes to Fort Worth downtown, 25 minutes to Cowboys Stadium, Six Flags, major Shopping, 35 minutes to DFW airport and 10 minutes to Spink Airport.
column8: Cozy Guest House in Gated Community
